name: Projectionist and the search for hearts
name_original: Projectionist and the search for hearts
description:
“NOT AN OFFICIAL BENDY AND THE INK MACHINE PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH JOEY DREW STUDIOS INC.”

You are the projectionist looking for hearts while you face the butcher gang, searches, lost ones, tom and the ink demon

. This game is silly, don't take it seriously.
